Opening address from today’s press conference with Thunder GM Sam Presti

Full Video | https://t.co/wHX42AnvyR https://t.co/3XZagP4g4G

As he typically does at the end of every season, on Monday Thunder GM Sam Presti spoke at length with reporters as he shared his view of the Thunder in 2021-22, the upcoming offseason and the team’s connection to OKC

Full Story 📝 ⤵️

❝We're trying to create a future. We're going to enjoy and embrace and love whatever happens here because it's going to be ours and the people who are walking with us. It's going to be individually ours, Oklahoma's❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝We have confidence that we are going to be successful. But the only way is if we show humility in the face of what we are trying to accomplish, keep our head down and focus not on what we need to do, but how we need to do it.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝People in Oklahoma don't expect to be handed things. They expect to work for that they get, they expect to do it together, unified.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝COVID disrupted more than anything for us community engagement. We haven’t been able to be out in the way that we know how to and want to.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝Trying to fix things quickly takes a very long time. You can’t have one eye on the clock and one eye on the destination. We need to have two eyes on the path.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝We’re closer to being the team we want to be this season than we were last season, but we’re still really far away from ultimately getting to the level we want to be at.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝We are heading into our second draft as we continue to reposition the team. It allows us to build some continuity. That continuity is really important to us.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝Oklahoma State Motto. Labor Omnia Vincit. Hard work conquers all. That's the mentality of the team. We have a lot of hard work in front of us. We have to grind in and do it. That's what the state is about.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝Our team has to be more physical next season. You can’t play meaningful games or games of consequence if you’re not playing physical and competing.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝It boiled down to competitiveness. It’s not about wins and losses, it’s about teeing it up and understanding what it is we are trying to accomplish as a group and competing.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti

❝I feel just about every single guy improved, but the important thing was the development of the team itself. Halfway through the year, we started playing more efficiently. We started finding a style of play that enhanced the guys that we had.❞

- Exec. VP and GM, Sam Presti
